extendedInfo.description: Winner of eBay's Star Developer Award!- Speedy access to eBay- Bid timer countdowns- My eBay- Search ebay active/completed- Bid & Buy it Now- ebay notifications- Scan barcodes to search ebay- ebay Messaging- Supports USA, UK, DE, AU, CA, FR, IT, ES

reviews.comment: User friendly easy to use a great tool for when your out and about love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Glynis
reviews.comment: Fantastic app, pictures are so clear , I love it , well done , its brilliant, The app is running 35 min fast keep getting message to say item has ended when it hasn\'t , ive tried uninstalling it and re instaling  but nothing seems to work , so im giving it 4 stars ,bug  fix and ill give it 5
reviews.author: glynis nolan

reviews.title: Great app..for a quick peek
reviews.comment: Works well,light weight,and did I say...fast. good job
reviews.author: Kenneth S. Griffith

reviews.title: Excellent eBay app
reviews.comment: Works loads faster than the official app! Has everything you want too. Big +1 from me;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: After updating the app, I can no longer log in nor do anything but search. I cannot watch an item or nothing. Before update it worked perfect!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Great app but needs a way to calcualate shipping. It gives an estimate that\'s way off sometimes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Had this app on 4 phones of my own and on two of wife\'s . Love it use it everyday
reviews.author: Rick Lewis

reviews.title: Best buy!
reviews.comment: Unlike the official ebay app, this one works! Highly recommend this product.
reviews.author: Chuck Kendrick

reviews.title: Ok...somethings could be better
reviews.comment: I use this as my second app having two ebay accounts.  One mine and one my partners.  I use the official one as my other app.  cant find my feedback anywhere on this app and even though I have set up notifications they dont come through on my phone. Easy to use just missing vital points.
reviews.author: Helen davison

reviews.title: Good in principle, could go further
reviews.comment: Works better than the eBay app these days. Looks nice for the most part although some images of products corrupt badly.  Now needs to add saved searches.
reviews.author: Ian Farmer

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Running on Lenovo Ideapad Pocket auctions runs great and helps me stay on top of my eBay while on the go
reviews.author: kevin johnson

reviews.title: Ebay item pop ups
reviews.comment: Annoying item ads from ebay started to show up and its very annoying.   If you aren\'t careful you could click on the buy-it-now button.  Ebay apps shouldn\'t be doing this.  My other ebay app doesn\'t
reviews.author: Barb Fischer

reviews.title: So far I m   liking this app
reviews.comment: Well this app is letting me see everything. Nit I\'m not finding what I need to get..
reviews.author: D Analetto

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Fast, simple, light weight and easy to use. A good eBay app
reviews.author: neil Nevill

reviews.title: Great App, lite and simple.
reviews.comment: Haven\' tried others but no reason to change, works perfectly
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hi
reviews.comment: Its great but don\'t let U do half the things ebays official app does but its good for a back up app try it. works excellent on my HTC Desire hd no issues :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: I wish I could look at my favorite sellers, but other then that this is a very nice alternative.
reviews.author: Luke Andersen

reviews.comment: Now with Samsung Galaxy Note 2, works ok but only show 30 watched items. Why???\tWorks really awesome!!! I won kazillions of stuff with this app, works great with my xperia x10 - riri
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pocket EBay Auctions
reviews.comment: I like the app. Its simple and user friendly.  Wish it would save my history and searches after a master restore.
reviews.author: Lavish P Fleur

reviews.title: Pocket app
reviews.comment: This pocket app is wonderful u can take ebay everywhere u go and never miss out of the great things on here. Love this app. Can\'t get enough of this app. Deborah Radford
reviews.author: Debby Radford
